column2:
"Zeno's always crazy busy with requests, so I figured
I'd better find something to keep myself busy, too."

"That's why I decided to start going on all sorts of
missions. And since you're here, how about joining
me?"

"Hey, I could totally go it alone if I wanted to!
It's just, don't you remember how they taught us
not to go on missions by ourselves?"

"Well, come on, let's go. We're off to the White
Summit. We have some exploring to do!"
